TAYLOR -- Ralph Caputo always tried to instill respect for animals in his children.
Now, he has the respect of an international animal rights organization.
Mr. Caputo's daughter, Cassandra, 8, wrote an essay about her dad and is one of five winners in the People for the Ethical Treatment of Animals' "World's Kindest Dad" essay contest.
Cassandra's mother, Lisa Caputo, said she noticed the contest on PETA2's Web site. She helped her daughter, a student at St. Mary's School, Old Forge, send out the essay online.
